name: Arcade Break-In
description:
A game where your character attributes can change by going into the machine and changing them. A one level, very short game, where you have to think about what you do!

WASD to move, Escape to go to main menu (saves spot, but game doesn't save spot when it is closed), and a secret key to get into the machine.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #37 in 3 days.

Theme: Inside The Machine

All assets made by me.
